scripts.release-latest: lerna publish from-package && yarn run update-lock:latest
scripts.release-latest:ci: lerna publish from-package --yes && yarn run update-lock:latest
scripts.update-latest: yarn build && lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate --create-release github && yarn clean-changelog && yarn update-tag:latest
scripts.update-latest:ci: yarn build && lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate --create-release github --yes && yarn clean-changelog && yarn update-tag:latest
scripts.update-next: yarn build && lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-prerelease --preid alpha --create-release github  && yarn clean-changelog && yarn update-tag:next
scripts.update-next:ci: yarn build && lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-prerelease --preid alpha --create-release github --yes && yarn clean-changelog && yarn update-tag:next
